Author: xsdylas
Text: Wow, I am so sorry. This would devastate me. Although it isn't what you thought it was, you can consider it a bullet dodged. Them lying to you does *not* mean you can't live independently or that you can't hack it! You can find a good job and you deserve all the best. Please stay.  Also, if you're in the US, you can leave a devastatingly honest (and anonymous) review of their company on Glassdoor. Fuck them.
